keynotes.speaker: Jessica McKellar
keynotes.body: Jessica McKellar is an entrepreneur, software engineer, and open source developer from San Francisco, California, USA. She is a former Director for the Python Software Foundation, PyCon North America's Diversity Outreach Chair, and a maintainer for several open source projects, including OpenHatch and the Twisted event-driven networking engine. For her outreach efforts in the Python community, she was awarded the O'Reilly Open Source Award in 2013.

keynotes.speaker: Andrey Vlasovskikh
keynotes.body: Andrey is the PyCharm Community Lead, the maintainer of the Vim emulation for PyCharm, a contributor to PEP 484 Type Hints. He is also the author of funcparserlib, a functional parsing library for Python, and an organizer of Python meetups in Russia.
